Poetic Translation: And he can sing a long time,

Direct Translation: See translation at the Choral Public Domain Library.

Lyrics: Ma non fa come gli altri uccelli
Poetic Translation: He is not like the other birdies;

Lyrics: Come li han cantato un poco,
Poetic Translation: After they've done a little singing,

Lyrics: Van de fatto in altro loco
Poetic Translation: On their way elsewhere they go winging.

Lyrics: Sempre el grillo sta pur saldo,

Poetic Translation: When the heat is fierce and searing,
Then sings the cricket for love purely.
